text: Pedro Paulo Requena Cisneros (born 24 January 1991) is a Peruvian professional footballer who plays as a Right defender for Universidad César Vallejo in the Peruvian Segunda División ==References== ==External links== * fichajes.com * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Lima Category:Peruvian footballers Category:Peru international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Total Chalaco footballers Category:Club Deportivo Universidad César Vallejo footballers Category:Peruvian Primera División players Category:2015 Copa América players
title: Pedro Paulo Requena
